Events.PreEventString: Something buried in the sand glimmers. You find a $1, lucky you!
Events.PostEventString: You pick it up and continue on your way.

Events.PreEventString: As the dusk approaches, stronger Pokemon begin to hunt. A $1 attacks you.
Events.PostEventString: After defeating the wild Pokemon, you pick up the $1 it was holding.

Events.PreEventString: Deep in the water, you see a glowing crystal. A voice sounds in your mind: YE WHO SEEK AWAKENING, LET US BEGIN.
Nothing like the relaxing sunset to forget all of your troubles. You lie in the sand alongside your Pokemon.
Events.PostEventString: Your Pokemon have recovered some health.

Events.PreEventString: Nothing like the relaxing sunset to forget all of your troubles. You lie in the sand alongside your Pokemon.
Events.PostEventString: Your Pokemon have recovered from their status conditions.

Events.PreEventString: In the distance, you see a $1 following you. It has been doing so for miles. It's pretending not to like you, but it's clear it wants to have an adventure.
Events.PostEventString: It will probably help you during your battles.

Events.PreEventString: The wind picks up, sand blows in your face. It's coarse and rough and irritating and it gets everywhere.
Events.PostEventString: You trip trying to find a place to get cover. Your Pokemon sustain some damage.

Events.PreEventString: As you walk knee-deep in the water, it starts to get cold as the sun sets...
Events.PostEventString: A Pokemon in your team has frostbite due to the cold water.

Events.PreEventString: $1 is wating for you. The sun is shining on your face: Before you can even react, you're thrust into a fight! Your pokemon are fully healed before the battle.
Events.PostEventString: Truly a duel for the ages... But it's time to move on.

Events.PreEventString: A member of the Pokemon Research Society is sunbathing.
Events.PostEventString: He's reading a $1, but it's clear they don't really understand what it says. 'Well maybe you'll have better luck'

Events.PreEventString: A Team Paradox grunt is on a makeshift kiosk selling bootleg Move Disks.
Events.PostEventString: When he sees you' he starts getting nervous. ''I'm leaving soon, I swear''. He gaves you a $1 for your silence.

Floors.ShortcutClue: You could probably swim across to reach the sandbank quicker.
Floors.ShortcutResolution: Your $1 allows you to reach the distant sandbanks.

Floors.ShortcutClue: You can swim across to the next sandbanks, but the currents are strong and whirlpools are forming...
In this spot, you can't see the sea floor. Just a dark abbyss below.
Floors.ShortcutResolution: Your $1 lets you ride a sea current into the unknown...

BossEvent.PreEventString: Even though it's getting dark, you suddenly don't feel cold anymore. The sea begins to shine as your heart feels warm...
BossEvent.PostEventString: The angel of the sea bids you farewell. It gives you $1 as a sign of your eternal friendship ♥

CampingEvent.PreEventString: Nothing like the relaxing sunset to forget all of your troubles. It's a perfect place for a picnic.
CampingEvent.PostEventString: But now it's time to move on...
